extends Node

    An abstract class for a transition node in Petri net

        Parameters:
        label - A name of transitions
        index - An integer for ID
        guard - An object of AST for the guard function
        update - An object of AST for the (additional) update function
        priority - An integer for the priority
        vanishable - A logical value to represent the transition can be vanished
